about_the_game:
The Official Soundtrack for RUNNING WITH RIFLES: EDELWEISS lends music to the tale of Allied forces as they made their journey across Europe late in WW2. Illustrating their heroism in their drive to stop evil from conquering the world, the music transitions from more humble beginnings to rising tension as they close in on Germany itself.

The soundtrack includes all mission loading tracks from the game, victory cues, the three action cues for 'boss' battles, and a handful of bonus cues from RUNNING WITH RIFLES: PACIFIC.

RUNNING WITH RIFLES: EDELWEISS Official Soundtrack is composed by Karl Feuerstake.
With purchasing the OST, you support our artist's work, thank you!

18 tracks, 28:38 min. Includes 320 kbps MP3 and WAV files (44.1khz/16bit)
